name: Knight Club: Deluxe
description:
KNIGHT CLUB: DELUXE is the follow up to the original Knight Club, with tons of additional content and balance changes!

Designed For Competitive Play
Knight Club has been built with competition in mind, and features a slew of classic fighting game mechanics. Counter hit, just defend, wavedash, and crossup your way to victory!

Perfect For Parties
Not in the mood for brutal competition? No problem. Knight Club has a handful of casual game modes that are perfect for 2-4 players!

Online Multiplayer
No friends? No problem! Take the fight to random strangers online in any game mode, with up to 4 players!

Choose Your Weapons
Pick a main weapon, and a sub weapon that accentuates your play style. Mix and match any of the main weapons and sub weapons to make devastating combinations.
